InfoMark

a scalable, modern and open-source online course management system supporting auto-testing of programming assignments
Download Latest Release

Wehave developed InfoMark to support hundreds of students and several TAs in university courses that involve evaluating weekly programming tasks. Students can upload their homework solution and get instant feedback from the system as unit tests automatically verify the solution after uploading. TAs will see more test outputs and can write feedback.

The system uses the following frameworks and technologies:

Elm Go Redis Postgres AMPQ Prometheus Docker Swagger


Frontend

Containing a Single-Page-Application written in ELM

Backend

Containing the RESTful JSON webserver
